transArray.content: The price is affordable. The room is clean and bright. The breakfast is also quite healthy. The overall price/performance ratio is goodüëç

Dear guest, thank you for your support and trust in us. The hotel is very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and can be reached without taking a car. It is also very close to Joy City and is very convenient for shopping and food. Our breakfast is a Chinese and Western buffet. There are many varieties, including Beijing‚Äôs special snacks. We look forward to your coming here often.
